script.name: Sync_MOD_UnProtected_BVLAN
script.content:
# @METADATASTART #@DetailDescriptionStart ############################################################################# # Extreme Networks(R) CLI Scripting Library # scripting.Script : Synchronization of unprotected B-VLAN configuration ############################################################################# # Revision : 1.0 # Last Updated : 10-JAN-2010 ############################################################################# # Author Name : NMS Team ############################################################################# # Purpose: ############################################################################# # 1. Synchronize unprotected B-VLAN configurations ############################################################################# #@DetailDescriptionEnd
# @ScriptDescription "Synchronizes unprotected B-VLAN configuration" # @SectionStart (description = "Unprotected B-VLAN Create Params") # @VariableFieldLabel (description = "802.1ah B-VLAN Name", # type = VLAN_NAME, # scope = global, # required = yes, # readonly = no) set var unprotBVLanOldName ""
# @VariableFieldLabel (description = "802.1ah B-VLAN New Name", # type = VLAN_NAME, # scope = global, # required = yes, # readonly = no) set var unprotBVLanNewName ""
# @VariableFieldLabel (description = "Choose Modification Action-Type", # type = String, # scope = global, # required = yes, # validValues = [Modify_Create,Modify_Delete,Modify_Insert,Modify_Remove,Modify_INSREM,Modify_RENAME]) set var unprotBVLanModifyActionType Modify_Create
# @SectionEnd
# @MetaDataEnd
######################################################################## ## Sync B-VLAN and Topology on this device for Client to see ########################################################################
IF ([expr [string length $unprotBVLanNewName] > 0]) THEN PerformSync -device $deviceIP -scope PBB -bvlan $unprotBVLanNewName ELSE PerformSync -device $deviceIP -scope PBB -bvlan $unprotBVLanOldName ENDIF
if {[string equal $unprotBVLanModifyActionType "Modify_RENAME"]} { PerformSync -device $deviceIP -scope EapsDomain }
script.creator: system
